p: GraphPad Prism version 8.4 (GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA, USA) and Microsoft Excel software were used to analyze the data and plot graphs. Mean values of repeated experiments presented as percentage growth inhibition of the various extracts were evaluated with the 50% growth inhibitory concentration (IC 50) for the various extract calculated by a nonlinear regression analysis. Differences among three or more groups were assessed with ANOVA followed by Turkey post hoc correction analyses, while differences between any two groups were evaluated by Student's T-test analysis at p < 0.05.
